name: Aquitect's Will
oracle_text: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"You may want to hold your breath."
—Kellyg, merrow aquitect

name: Boggart Brute
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

name: Brute Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's not the size of the rock. It's how badly you want to lift it.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Essence Scatter
flavor_text:
"What you attempt to pull from the aether, I can spread onto the wind."
—Jace Beleren

name: Forgotten Cave
oracle_text:
Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Foundry Street Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

name: Ghostfire
oracle_text:
Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

name: Goblin Tunneler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "The best way over the mountain is through."

name: Inkfathom Divers
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

name: Krenko's Command
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

name: Lonely Sandbar
oracle_text:
Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Scroll Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

name: Streambed Aquitects
oracle_text:
{T}: Target Merfolk creature gets +1/+1 and gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

name: Tarfire
oracle_text: Tarfire deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Tidal Warrior
oracle_text: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.
flavor_text: The tide of battle favors those who can swim.

name: Tidal Wave
oracle_text: Create a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"The floor of the sea is paved with the shattered remnants of vessels that navigated its surface unwelcomed."
—Thassa, god of the sea
